Durjoy Datta: He is a best-selling author, who is also the co-founder of Grapevine India
Publishers. He currently has eight books under his wing, four of which were bestsellers in the
Hindustan Times Bestseller List. His first book, Of Course I Love You! released in 2008 while
he was 21 and still in college. After its tremendous success, he has gone on to release 8 more
bestselling novels. Some of these titles are Till The Last Breath, If It’s Not Forever, and Ohh Yes,
I am Single. Durjoy uses a narrative style to depict several plots, which finally converge into a
single plot at the end.
Durjoy is a graduate of Delhi College of Engineering. He received his PGDBM from the
Management Development Institute, and Frankfurt School of Finance and Management. He has
received recognition for his contribution to media and literature. In 2009, Durjoy was elected
as a young achiever by The Times of India, and in 2012, he received the Teacher’s Achievement
Award. He was also chosen as one of the two young achievers in the field of Media and
Communications by Whistling Woods International in 2011. Durjoy has written many books
with authors such as Orvana Ghai, Nikita Singh, and Maanvi Ahuja.
